abstract: Photographer Lynn Saville's images of New York City at night capture an urban environment in a state of flux; images, on view at Pratt Institute, are set to be published in book Dark City: Urban America at Night.
lead_paragraph: Lynn Saville’s photographs of New York during that near-dark moment when one state of being is just about to become something else.

headline.main: New York Captured Between the Day and the Dark

snippet: Lynn Saville’s photographs of New York during that near-dark moment when one state of being is just about to become something else.
